channel.title: Comments for page "Triple Triangle Bonus"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Triple Triangle Bonus"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Agreed. For that matter, if your range is that low, you most likely wouldn't have beaten PW easy, much less hard, unless you FTGT'd the entire thing (which you can't, for the quests)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: And if your range was that low, then you shouldn't be doing Doukai in the first place. xP

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, you're most likely right. Only way the range would be better is if you had extremely low range, so the levels themselves would give not much bonus…and you really need to do PW hard first anyways.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Unfortunately for you guys, Doughman 3 and Robogirl 3 outweigh the bonus of Extra Sausage, though Suchan 2 is the best third character to use with that team.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, my thought was the Extra Sausage team for the 9 range, and 3 levelsuccesses (after all, you ARE using TFoM, right?), and balancing tacos for stamina, and pizzas for even more stats. I'd have to crunch some numbers, though, to find the right balance.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: :-3 You'd need a specialized squad to just sting a Doukai. There exist methods, surely, through Burger and Pizza. however, I don't necessarily think these will get you far.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Finally, a use for this team! Though s-ranking a dou worldkai is going to hurt.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Well, yeah, but they aren't usable in BN either IIRC. It's the same as Emosuke in wasteland.

Either way, I tested, and pinky lvl. 3 is disabled in BN as well, so no team.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, good point…then again, Haro and Robogirl aren't PW/BN allies, but they end up as such…well, Haro is used in a quest, anyways.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Seeing as Billy and Stalkergirl aren't BN allies, this team isn't usable in that content. I'm not sure about pinky specifically or her jutsu, though.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
So if they don't stack, how does it work? Would you get 6 range in the main 3 stats, and 5 in Dou, or what? I'm confused…

And if the team provides Dou range/levels, can you take them on BN/PW missions, or are they only good for Dou kaiju/worldkai?
